argument.name: stateVariablesJSON
argument.description: A JSON object definition with name-value pairs for each of the variables to set in the state object.

discussion.p: The *[js:formViewSetStateVariables]* method can be used to set variables in a FormView control's state object. State variables can be referenced in the FormView Layout template.
